posts.post_content:
VG/X - X

I have been trying to wrap up this set for a while so likely I would add a few dimes for the right card. Holidays are coming up!

Not sure if you've seen this already posted, but it seems to match what you're looking for 
[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=340964[/url]
Hunter--I'm not sure that card would grade a 4 by today's standards.

(hello Jay!) judging by my own standards - the card (which I believe I was offered previously) is only about good to very good at best with a few distracting flaws and would be a bit out of place in my set - something I'm determined to avoid. I had this card once in g or vg (CRS?) but the registration was quite a bit off and it bothered me to look at it. Sold it for around 2100. and haven't been able to replace it since then. All the while the asking prices continue to escalate. Would like to finish the set before the world ends. Just looking with condition/aesthetics in mind and willing to pay up for it.
